```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("instacart")

# Data frame for Figure 1
items_order_df = instacart %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(
    aisle = as.factor(aisle)
  ) %>% 
  count(aisle) %>% #count the number of items in each aisle
  filter(n > 10000) #filter items ordered > 10000
```

```{r}
# Data frame for Figure 2.
pink_coffee_df = instacart %>% 
  mutate(
  order_dow = as.factor(order_dow),
  order_dow = recode(order_dow, 
                       `0` = "Mon",
                       `1` = "Tue",
                       `2` = "Wed",
                       `3` = "Thu",
                       `4` = "Fri",
                       `5` = "Sat",
                       `6` = "Sun")
  ) %>% 
  select(order_hour_of_day, order_dow, product_name) %>% #select the data we are interested in
  filter(product_name %in% c("Pink Lady Apples", "Coffee Ice Cream")) %>% #filter out these two products
  arrange(order_dow, order_hour_of_day) %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  group_by(product_name)

```


Column {data-width=550}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
# Create a template for x-axis and y-axis
x1_template = list(
  title = "Count",
  nticks = 20
)

y1_template = list(
  title = "Aisle",
  nticks = 20
)

items_order_df %>% 
  mutate(aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~n, y = ~aisle, type = "bar"
  ) %>%  
  layout(
    xaxis = x1_template,
    yaxis = y1_template,
    title = "Figure 1: Number of items ordered in each aisle (>10000)"
  )
```

### Chart B

```{r warning = FALSE}
x2_template = list(
  title = "Day of week"
)

y2_template = list(
  title = "The hour of a day"
)

pink_coffee_df %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~order_dow, y = ~order_hour_of_day, color = ~product_name, type = "box"
  ) %>% 
  layout(
    boxmode = "group",
    title = "Figure 2. Distribution of the hour of the day at which \nPink Lady Apples and Coffee Ice Cream are ordered",
    xaxis = x2_template,
    yaxis = y2_template
  )
```
